tabs.content:
.drop table silver_contoso_health

.create table silver_contoso_health ( 
    timestamp: datetime, 
    event_id: string, 
    source: string,
    department: string, 
    department_code: string, 
    base_claims: int, 
    Billed_Amount: int, 
    Collection_Amount: int, 
    Claims_Rejections: int 
) 


 bronze_contoso_health 
    | extend sensor_data_parsed = parse_json(sensor_data) 
    | evaluate bag_unpack(sensor_data_parsed) 
    | extend timestamp = todatetime(timestamp) 
    | project timestamp, 
    tostring(event_id),
    tostring(source), 
    tostring(Department), 
    tostring(department_code), 
    toint(base_claims), 
    toint(Billed_Amount),
    toint(Collection_Amount), 
    toint(Claims_Rejections)

 

// Update policy code 

.alter table silver_contoso_health policy update 
```[{ 
    "IsEnabled": true, 
    "Source": "bronze_contoso_health", 
    "Query": "parse_constoso_health", 
    "IsTransactional": true, 
    "PropagateIngestionProperties": false 
}]``` 


.create-or-alter  function parse_constoso_health(){
    bronze_contoso_health 
    | extend sensor_data_parsed = parse_json(sensor_data) 
    | evaluate bag_unpack(sensor_data_parsed) 
    | extend timestamp = todatetime(timestamp) 
    | project timestamp, 
    tostring(event_id),
    tostring(source), 
    tostring(Department), 
    tostring(department_code), 
    toint(base_claims), 
    toint(Billed_Amount),
    toint(Collection_Amount), 
    toint(Claims_Rejections)
}

bronze_contoso_health
| take 10

silver_contoso_health
| take 10


.create table silver_contoso_health (
    ["Insurance_Company"]: string,
    timestamp: datetime,
    event_id: string,
    Department: string,
    department_code: string,
    base_claims: int,
    Billed_Amount: int,
    Collection_Amount: int,
    Claims_Rejections: int
)
 
// Update policy code
.alter table silver_contoso_health policy update
```[{
    "IsEnabled": true,
    "Source": "bronze_contoso_health",
    "Query": "bronze_contoso_health | extend sensor_data_parsed = parse_json(sensor_data) | evaluate bag_unpack(sensor_data_parsed) | extend timestamp = todatetime(timestamp) | project timestamp, tostring(source) as ['Insurance_Company'], tostring(Department), tostring(department_code), toint(base_claims), toint(Billed_Amount), toint(Collection_Amount), toint(Claims_Rejections), tostring(event_id)",
    "IsTransactional": true,
    "PropagateIngestionProperties": false
}]```


silver_contoso_health

.show operations 
// | take 10
